mapper.select: select * from doctor where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into doctor(name, username, password, hospital, department, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{hospital}, #{department}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.update: update doctor set name=#{name} where id=#{id}
update doctor set sex=#{sex} where id=#{id}
update doctor set hospital=#{hospital} where id=#{id}
update doctor set department=#{department} where id=#{id}
